      • fixResourceIds

        public static void fixResourceIds​(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Bundle bundle)
        Finds each resource within the Bundle that has an invalid ID, assigns a new ID to the resource that is based on a hash of the original ID. Finds any references to those invalid IDs and updates them.
        Parameters:
        bundle - The bundle to fix IDs to resources for
